name: Long Context Processing
description: Summarizing and extracting from large documents.
content:
# Long Context Processing

Process texts larger than the context window.

## Text Generation
```python
summary = lc.long_context_processing(
    text_to_process=very_long_text,
    contextual_prompt="Summarize the main points.",
    chunk_size_tokens=4000
)
```

## Structured Extraction (TP)
```python
result = lc.llm.tp.long_context_processing(
    text_to_process=book_text,
    contextual_prompt="Extract all character names.",
    processing_type="structured",
    schema={"type": "object", "properties": {"names": {"type": "array"}}}
)
```
